name: Verify user is able to edit issuing line and issuing requisition type data before finalizing

testSteps.description: 1: Verify user is able to edit issuing line and issuing requisition type data before finalizing ({Issue Type=Requisition, Recipient Store=Dubai 2, Distributed Option=No, Product Type=Vaccine, Product=YF, Batch Number=200A, Units=1})

children.description: Given User is on home page of SMT application
And User is able to see login button on home page
Validate login button on home page
When User click on login button
Click login button
And User click on Proceed To Login button in "English"
Click proceed to login button: English
Then User login as "Store Operator"
User login: Store Operator
And User click on "Apply" button
Click on button: Apply
And User click on "Issuing" tab
Click on tab: Issuing
And User wait for "5" seconds
Given User click on "Issue New Stock" button
Click on button: Issue New Stock
And "Issue New Stock" text is visible
Validate text is visible: Issue New Stock
And User select "Requisition" from "Issue Type" in "Issuing" tab
Select value from dropdown issuing: Requisition, Issue Type
And User type and select "Dubai 2" from "Recipient Store / Reason" in "Issuing" tab
Type and select value from dropdown: Dubai 2, Recipient Store / Reason
And User select "No" from "Distributed Late" in "Issuing" tab
Select value from dropdown issuing: No, Distributed Late
And User enter random text in "internationaRef"
Enter random text: internationaRef
Generate randomtext
When User click on "Add Line to Issue" button
Click on button: Add Line to Issue
Then "Add Product to Issue" heading is visible
Validate is heading visible: Add Product to Issue
And User select "Vaccine" from "Product Type" in "Issuing" tab
Select value from dropdown issuing: Vaccine, Product Type
And User select "YF" from "Product" in "Issuing" tab
Select value from dropdown issuing: YF, Product
And User select "200A" from "Batch Number" in "Issuing" tab
Select value from dropdown issuing: 200A, Batch Number
And User wait for "3" seconds
And User enter "1" in "dosesOrUnit"
Enter text in textbox: 1, dosesOrUnit
And User enter random text in "comment"
Enter random text: comment
Generate randomtext
When User click on "Save" button
Click on button: Save
And User wait for "3" seconds
Then Issuing line is created successfully
Validate created message displayed
And Issuing line Data is visible in issuing line table to user
And User click on "Save as draft and go back" button
Click on button: Save as draft and go back
And User wait for "5" seconds
And Validate issuing state is "Draft"
And User edit the Issuing data
And "View Issued Stock" text is visible
Validate text is visible: View Issued Stock
And User select "Requisition" from "Issue Type" in "Issuing" tab
Select value from dropdown issuing: Requisition, Issue Type
And User type and select "Dubai 2" from "Recipient Store / Reason" in "Issuing" tab
Type and select value from dropdown: Dubai 2, Recipient Store / Reason
And User select "No" from "Distributed Late" in "Issuing" tab
Select value from dropdown issuing: No, Distributed Late
And User enter random text in "internationaRef"
Enter random text: internationaRef
Generate randomtext
When User edit the line in issuing
Then "Editing Issued Stock" heading is visible
Validate is heading visible: Editing Issued Stock
And User select "Vaccine" from "Product Type" in "Issuing" tab
Select value from dropdown issuing: Vaccine, Product Type
And User select "YF" from "Product" in "Issuing" tab
Select value from dropdown issuing: YF, Product
And User select "200A" from "Batch Number" in "Issuing" tab
Select value from dropdown issuing: 200A, Batch Number
And User wait for "3" seconds
And User enter "1" in "dosesOrUnit"
Enter text in textbox: 1, dosesOrUnit

Enter random text: comment
Generate randomtext
When User click on "Update" button
Click on button: Update

Then Issuing line is updated successfully

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given User click on "Issue New Stock" button
And "Issue New Stock" text is visible
And User select "<Issue Type>" from "Issue Type" in "Issuing" tab
And User type and select "<Recipient Store>" from "Recipient Store / Reason" in "Issuing" tab
And User select "<Distributed Option>" from "Distributed Late" in "Issuing" tab
And User enter random text in "internationaRef"
When User click on "Add Line to Issue" button
Then "Add Product to Issue" heading is visible
And User select "<Product Type>" from "Product Type" in "Issuing" tab
And User select "<Product>" from "Product" in "Issuing" tab
And User select "<Batch Number>" from "Batch Number" in "Issuing" tab
And User wait for "3" seconds
And User enter "<Units>" in "dosesOrUnit"
And User enter random text in "comment"
When User click on "Save" button
And User wait for "3" seconds
Then Issuing line is created successfully
And Issuing line Data is visible in issuing line table to user
And User click on "Save as draft and go back" button
And User wait for "5" seconds
And Validate issuing state is "Draft"
And User edit the Issuing data
And "View Issued Stock" text is visible
And User select "<Issue Type>" from "Issue Type" in "Issuing" tab
And User type and select "<Recipient Store>" from "Recipient Store / Reason" in "Issuing" tab
And User select "<Distributed Option>" from "Distributed Late" in "Issuing" tab
And User enter random text in "internationaRef"
When User edit the line in issuing
Then "Editing Issued Stock" heading is visible
And User select "<Product Type>" from "Product Type" in "Issuing" tab
And User select "<Product>" from "Product" in "Issuing" tab
And User select "<Batch Number>" from "Batch Number" in "Issuing" tab
And User wait for "3" seconds
And User enter "<Units>" in "dosesOrUnit"
And User enter random text in "comment"
When User click on "Update" button
And User wait for "1" seconds
Then Issuing line is updated successfully
When User click on "Finalize" button
Then Issuing line is updated successfully
And User wait for "10" seconds
And Validate issuing state is "Complete"
And User wait for "60" seconds
